body.p:
Eaton START UP is mandatory for all PDUâ€™s purchased and is a sure way of getting your power quality equipment up and running as you need it. By following our standard START UP procedures, you can be assured that your power equipment will perform to your requirements. Features and benefits include these:
Eaton START UP services provide a factory-trained customer support engineer to oversee visual inspection of the installation and system calibration.
Eaton START UP service also provides factory-trained customer support engineers to assist with operational training.
Contact an Eaton service representative for detailed information about START UP services (see ).
